text: Joaquín Blanco Albalat (born 25 June 1989) is a Spanish competitive sailor. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's Laser class. He is the son of Olympic sailor Joaquín Blanco Roca.Joaquin Blanco at Sports Reference ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Spain Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – Laser Category:Mediterranean Games gold medalists for Spain Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in sailing Category:Competitors at the 2018 Mediterranean Games
title: Joaquín Blanco Albalat
